name: wbhi-redcap
label: WBHI REDCap Gear
description: Queries REDCap using DICOM metadata on Flywheel to find scans matching consenting participants.
author: Joe Wexler

match_csv.description: A csv file to manually match redcap records to flywheel subject. If included, will skip automatic matching and pi-copy. Should contain no header and three columns: 1) site, 2) redcap rid, 3) subject label

ignore_until_n_days_old.description: Ignore sessions that are less than n days old. Default = 1 day.

dry_run.description: Run dry-run. Dry-runs do not make any changes to REDCap or Flywheel.
